script.message: Running a quick monomer test with RFdiffusion...

script.command: conda run -n RFdiffusion_env python scripts/run_inference.py "contigmap.contigs=[150-150]" inference.output_prefix=./output_start_test inference.num_designs=1

on_fail.message: Test run failed. Check logs or script output for details.

script.message: RFdiffusion test run complete! Check ./output_start_test for results.
